department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 學之教學目標，乃在於教導學生認識藥物之作用原理及相關知識，應用與疾病治療之關係，增加學生對藥物機轉的知識。
goal.en: "The purpose of Pharmacology is to provide students the basic knowledge of drug-body interaction mechanism and therapeutic application, from both basic and clinical aspects."

outline.ch:
"Week 1: 藥理學概論(一) General Pharmacology (I)
Week 2: 藥理學概論(二) General Pharmacology (II)
Week 3: 抗菌藥物(一) Antimicrobial Agents (I)
Week 4: 抗菌藥物(二) Antimicrobial Agents (II)
Week 5: 抗高血壓藥 Antihypertensive Agents
Week 6: 降血脂劑與動脈粥狀硬化Lipid-Lowering Drugs &
Atherosclerosis
Week 7: 抗貧血藥 Anti-anemia
Week 8: 抗血栓藥 Anti-thrombosis
Week 9: 期中考Mid-term Examination
Week 10: 酒精與相關藥物 Alcohol and Related Compounds
Week 11: 細胞治療 Cell therapy
Week 12: 利尿劑與抗利尿劑Diuretics and Antiuretics
Week 13: 癌症化學藥物療法 Chemotherapy of Neoplasm
Week 14: 癌症標靶/藥物治療 Targeted Ccnaer Therapy
Week 15: 業界分享 Industry Expert Collaborative Teaching
Week 16: 業界分享 Industry Expert Collaborative Teaching
Week 17: 業界分享 Industry Expert Collaborative Teaching
Week 18: 期末考Final Examination"
outline.en:
"Week 1: 藥理學概論(一) General Pharmacology (I)

Week 13: 癌症化學藥物療法 Chemotherapy of Neoplasm
Week 14: 癌症標靶藥物治療 Targeted Ccnaer Therapy
Week 15: 業界分享 Industry Expert Collaborative Teaching
Week 16: 業界分享 Industry Expert Collaborative Teaching
Week 17: 業界分享 Industry Expert Collaborative Teaching
Week 18: 期末考Final Examination"

textbook.ch:
"Basic & clinical pharmacology /edited by
Bertram G. Katzung."
textbook.en:
"Basic & clinical pharmacology /edited by
Bertram G. Katzung."

gradMethod.ch: 出席 10% 期中考 45%  報告 45%
